featured.text: Bekoji’s legend Derartu Tulu, who won the 10,000-meter Olympic gold medals in 1992 and 2000, is a national hero.
The new structure will be 200 meters high, 100 meters shorter than the cast-iron Eiffel Tower built 100 years ago.
The tower, of pinewood, will be built on eight pillars and will be topped with a flower of five metal petals of 700 square meters each.

other.text: The Cambodian tea tree grows five meters tall.
The Chinese variety, a strong plant that can grow to be 2.75 meters high, can live to be 100 years old and survives cold winters.
The Assamese variety can grow 18 meters high and lives about 40 years.

definition.zh_def: 計量單位，通常用於測量長度，等於一百公分。
definition.en_def: A unit of measurement equal to 100 centimeters, used to measure length.
definition.example: The room is three meters long.
